arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًۭى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
That	exalted Book (The Qur’an), has no	
place for doubt in it; a guidance for the	
pious
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	 bulañd rutba Kitāb	 (Qur'ān), koi	
shak	ki jagah nhiñ ismeñ	hidāyat hai dar	
waloñ ko

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Those who believe without seeing	 (the	
hidden), and keep the (obligatory)	
prayer established, and spend in Our	
cause	 from	 what	 We	 have	 bestowed	
upon	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo be-dekhe Īmān lāyeñ, aur Namāz	
Qāyim rakheñ, aur Hamāri di hui Rozī me	
se Hamāri rāh me uthaieñ
